name: Tion Wayne
description:
'''Dennis Junior Odunwo''' (born 1 September 1993), known professionally as '''Tion Wayne''', is a British rapper and DJ from Edmonton, North London.

He appeared on three top-10 singles on [[UK Singles Chart]] as a guest – [[NSG (group)|NSG]]'s "[[Options (NSG song)|Options]]", "Keisha & Becky" with [[Russ Millions]] and [[KSI]]'s track "[[Houdini (rapper)|Houdini]]" – before getting his first top 10 hit as the lead artist with "[[I Dunno (Tion Wayne song)|I Dunno]]" featuring [[Dutchavelli]] and [[Stormzy]], which peaked at number 7, and having his first number 1 with "[[Body (Russ Millions and Tion Wayne song)|Body]]" alongside [[Russ Millions]].
